item.title: Golang Notes
item.author: cyrusncy@gmail.com (CyrusN)
item.description: Useful commands update all packages go get -u all Feautre Embedding Understanding Goroutine Is golang goroutine a coroutine? Coroutine vs Continuation vs Generator Comparison with generators MongoDB mgo Painless Data Storage with MongoDB and Go Connecting to MongoDB with mgo and golang Router mux - Gorilla, the golang web toolkit # Middleware justinas/alice: Painless middleware chaining for Go Database Model Architecture Go database/sql tutorial Practical Persistence in Go: Organising Database Access Practical Persistence in Go: SQL Databases How to use databases with Golang – Hacker Noon Architecture for a Golang Web App - Larry Price Trying Clean Architecture on Golang – Hacker Noon Applying The Clean Architecture to Go applications » The Log Book of Manuel Kiessling Authentication dgrijalva/jwt-go: Golang implementation of JSON Web Tokens (JWT) Golang Authentication Using JSON Web Tokens Useful Package PuerkitoBio/goquery: A little like that j-thing, only in Go.
